stempy.feature.ptsarray¶

class stempy.feature.ptsarray(pts, u=None, v=None)[source]¶

An array of points in two-dimensional space, a subclass of numpy.ndarray.

Parameters

  • pts (array_like) – points data which contain x and y information.

  • u (array_like, optional) – basis vector u in the context of periodic lattice

  • v (array_like, optional) – basis vector v in the context of periodic lattice

Returns

obj (pts_array)

Notes

Attributes

angle

the angle vlaues of the points in degree.

length

the length values of the points from the origin.

Methods

clear([delta])

Clear non-lattice points.

clear_border(shape, size)

Clear the border points.

extract_patches(img, size)

Extract patches from the location points.

generate_mask(size)

shift(x, y)

Shift the point by giving x and y.
clear(delta=0.1)[source]¶

Clear non-lattice points. :param delta:

clear_border(shape, size)[source]¶

Clear the border points. :param shape: :param size:

extract_patches(img, size)[source]¶

Extract patches from the location points.

Parameters

  • img (2d-array) – the image to be extracted.

  • size (int) – the shape of single patch is (2*size+1).

Returns

ps (3d-array) – the extracted patches in stack.

generate_mask(size)[source]¶
shift(x, y)[source]¶

Shift the point by giving x and y. :param x: :type x: float :param y: :type y: float
